1 #pragma ident "$Id$"

4 
5 #ifndef GPSTK_FILE_STORE_INCLUDE
6 #define GPSTK_FILE_STORE_INCLUDE
7 
8 #include <vector>
9 #include <iostream>
10 #include <iomanip>
11 #include "Exception.hpp"
12 
13 namespace gpstk
14 {
24  template <class HeaderType> class FileStore
25  {
26  private:
27 
29  std::map<std::string, HeaderType> headerMap;
30 
31  public:
32 
34  FileStore() throw() {};
35 
37  ~FileStore() {};
38 
40  std::vector<std::string> getFileNames() const
41  {
42  std::vector<std::string> names;
43  typename std::map<std::string, HeaderType>::const_iterator fit;
44  for(fit=headerMap.begin(); fit != headerMap.end(); fit++)
45  names.push_back(fit->first);
46  return names;
47  }
48 
50  void addFile(const std::string& fn, HeaderType& header)
51  throw(InvalidRequest)
52  {
53  if(headerMap.find(fn) != headerMap.end()) {
54  dump(std::cout, 1);
55  InvalidRequest e("Duplicate file name");
56  GPSTK_THROW(e);
57  }
58  headerMap.insert(make_pair(fn,header));
59  }
60 
62  const HeaderType& getHeader(const std::string& fn) const throw(InvalidRequest)
63  {
64  if(headerMap.find(fn) == headerMap.end()) {
65  InvalidRequest e("File name not found");
66  GPSTK_THROW(e);
67  }
68  return headerMap.at(fn);
69  // changed from headerMap[fn] since that is a non-const member of std::map
70  // and therefore could modify headerMap, making this function not be side-effect free
71  }
72 
74  void dump(std::ostream& os = std::cout, short detail = 0)
75  const throw()
76  {
77  int n(0);
78  os << "Dump of FileStore\n";
79  typename std::map<std::string, HeaderType>::const_iterator fit;
80  for(fit=headerMap.begin(); fit != headerMap.end(); fit++) {
81  os << " File " << std::setw(2) << ++n << ": " << fit->first;
82  if(detail >= 1) {
83  os << " (header for this file follows)\n";
84  (fit->second).dump(os);
85  }
86  else os << std::endl;
87  }
88  os << "End dump of FileStore\n";
89  }
90 
92  void clear()
93  throw()
94  {
95  headerMap.clear();
96  }
97 
98 
100  unsigned size() const throw() { return headerMap.size(); }
101 
102  unsigned nfiles() const throw() { return size(); }
103 
104  }; // end class FileStore
105 
107 
108 } // namespace
109 
110 #endif // GPSTK_FILE_STORE_INCLUDE
